user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to reply to me (editor@vitalvoices.com) and remind her she can consult her Gmail and Notion for any information she needs.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Quick Follow-Up on Your Contribution to Vital Voices

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well! When you have a moment, could you please reply directly to Mr. Thompson at editor@vitalvoices.com regarding your interview or guest article? 

If you need to reference any materials or past correspondence, feel free to check your Gmail and Notion—everything you might need should be there.

Thank you so much, and we look forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards,

[Your Name]
On behalf of Mr. Thompson, Editor  
Vital Voices

final_output:
